name: Reverie: Beginnings
description:
Sample Demo of a possible upcoming game. This is literally just a bare-bones game to gauge thoughts. Much much much more will be provided in future updates. This upload is more just to test distribution.

To play the Demo, simply download the .zip file and extract it wherever you like on your Desktop. Once it is extracted open the folder and simply click the Game.exe file and it will launch the game. That is all you need to do.
